main.name: Alexandre Bulcão
main.description: I'm passionate about programming, I like to play video games and my favorite sport is soccer and surfing.
main.bio: I'm from Brazil (BR), I live and work as a Fullstack Developer in Trofa, Portugal (PT). Graduated from Unip - Universidade Paulista in (Systems Analysis and Development), passionate about technology. I've been studying a lot about ReactJS, React-Native, AngularJS and VUE, taking advantage of everything Javascript has to offer..

work.title: Aluclass
work.description: I work with the frontend and backend of an e-commerce site, updating image information, improving SEO metrics, programming in RA - 3D (Unity/Tree.js), pricing and developing sections of php and javascript programs to improve the environment website look.

projects.title: Mario Kart Commercial Gamification
projects.category: Project developed with a team of designers and developers of a gamification for the commercial department, in order to obtain better results from this team. Screens (Hall of Fame, My Tasks, Discount Codes, After Sales Service, Customer Testimonials, Logistics, Administration) - Pass (alex-12345)

projects.title: App RA 3d products
